channel.title: Server start up help!
channel.description: Okay so I open my run.bat and run my server, i try to connect but it just says "Error Connecting to server" but when I leave the IP blank i can connect. The only weird part is that I don't have a router, I have modem. So if anybody could help it would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Server start up help!
item.dc:creator: @alpha_0nx alpha 0nx
item.description:
@alpha_0nx wrote:

And have you done all of the following…

[ol][li]Portforwarded[/li]
[li]Registered on No-ip.com, and downloaded[/li]
[li]Changed Environmental Variables[/li][/ol]

Those are the main 3 steps to starting a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Server start up help!
item.dc:creator: @Korkle777 Korkle777
item.description:
@Korkle777 wrote:

yeah but the problem is Other people can’t connect to my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Server start up help!
item.dc:creator: @alpha_0nx alpha 0nx
item.description:
@alpha_0nx wrote:

Usually you can log into YOUR server by using the ip 127.0.0.1 but sometimes people mess with these setting and change them to other ips, and sometimes leave them blank. If you have portforwarded, and Created a No-Ip, People will be able to connect to your server using your .no-ip.*** ip. You cannot connect this way tho. If a blank ip allows you to log in, just use a blank ip. No use in changing things that don’t effect the server.

Read full topic
